name: fhEVM-example-template
description: Base template for fhEVM example projects

scripts.test: hardhat compile && (ls test/*.test.* >/dev/null 2>&1 && NODE_NO_WARNINGS=1 TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true mocha -r ts-node/register/transpile-only -r hardhat/register 'test/**/*.test.ts' 2>&1 | grep -v MODULE_TYPELESS || echo 'No test files found')
